head.title: Villa OCTOPUS | Luxury Sanctuary

div.p: Newly Reimagined. Steps from the Sea.

div.style: max-width: 900px; margin: 0 auto; text-align: center; line-height: 1.6; font-size: 1.15rem;
div.p: Welcome to the newly reimagined Villa Octopus, your premier lagoon sanctuary where modern luxury meets the tranquil beauty of the Sri Lankan coast. Recently remodeled to offer contemporary comfort, our villa provides a sophisticated yet serene escape just steps away from the refreshing sea breeze.
Whether you are lounging in our stylish suites or enjoying the lush tropical gardens, we invite you to experience a new standard of seaside living.
Make yourself at home on the 2nd floor where you can lounge with your loved one on a four postered bed; overlooking the picturesque lagoon through our large windows.
With the comfort of air-conditioning, his and her bathrooms and spacious sitting areas- an additional bed is all it takes to make this private suite a family room.
